title: Who would win in a war between France and Italy pre-1939? - Quora

response.answer_text: France, most likely, depending on what the war aims were. France had the more powerful navy and a greater colonial empire. It was more industrialized and more advanced weaponry and logistics. Having said that Italy was certainly more politically unified. So if were was a political showdown somehow the Italians might have been able to come out on top. Mussolini was a better politician than general.
